messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Mining Dock.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to climate change, a whoop of wire eating mammals have stampeded into the place with all those juicy wires.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Well, The engine situation is nearly unsalvageable and the shard is quickly destabilzing, So I'm calling NT.  Please head towards the Escape shuttle docking bay

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to [REDACTED], a whoop of energy draining parasites have descended into the maintenance tunnels.
